meanings.definition: One who shows or exhibits something.
meanings.sent1: The displayer of the artwork guided us through the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was the main displayer of knowledge in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The displayer of magic tricks amazed the audience with their illusions.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a displayer of genuine happiness.
meanings.sent5: The displayer of emotions on his face made it easy to know how he was feeling.

meanings.definition: A device or piece of software used to show information or images on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The digital displayer in the store window attracted customers with its bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The displayer on his computer screen was very clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The displayer on the phone suddenly started showing funny emojis for no reason.
meanings.sent4: The displayer on the TV screen flickered and then went blank.
meanings.sent5: The displayer on the billboard was so bright it could be seen from far away.
